title-part.text: LAUNDERING, DRYING, IRONING, PRESSING OR FOLDING TEXTILE ARTICLES

reference.text: apparatus for blocking, pressing, steaming, or stretching hats A42C; treating textile materials by liquids, gases or vapours D06B; chemical matters, see D06L, D06M

note.note-paragraph:
This subclass covers:
- domestic or laundry dry-cleaning apparatus using volatile
solvents;
- domestic, laundry, or tailors` ironing or other hot-
pressing of clothes, linen, or other textile articles.

This subclass does not cover:
- apparatus for wringing, washing, dry-cleaning, ironing, or
other hot-pressing of textiles in manufacturing operations,
which is covered by suclass D06B, D06C.
